title: Intensive English Mastery for Medicine: Mobile-Based Short-Term Course

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing medical terminology acquisition and practical English communication skills for clinical scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend medical papers and clinical records with accurate vocabulary and grammar.
Learners can create an English summary using key medical terminology after listening to patient symptom descriptions.
Learners can conduct basic medical conversations (patient interviews, diagnostic explanations) in English for at least 5 minutes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
